text: Ara se'i narira mato hayo na ye tara suto khule phele tukaro tukaro kaâ€™re ta majabuta kare bonara pare. Tomadera sapathaguloke tomadera madhye chalanara jan'ye tomara byabahara karacha, yena tomadera eka jati an'ya jatira ca'ite ksamatasila hate para. Allah abasya'i era dbara tomadera pariksa karachena, ara yena kiyamatera dine tomadera kache suspasta karate parena ye- bisaye tomara matabheda karachile.
